remarks: The set of singletons is a refinement of any open covering of the discrete topology.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Jan-2020.)
statement:
dissnref.c $e |- C = { u | E. x e. X u = { x } } $.
dissnref $p |- ( ( X e. V /\ U. Y = X ) -> C Ref Y ) $.
$d C u x $.
$d V u x $.
$d X u x $.
$d Y u x $.
